DOC.brief_summary: The study investigate whether Probiotics ( CJLP243 ) give ileostomy repair operation patient rectal cancer improve bowel function .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Of Probiotics On Bowel Function Restoration After Ileostomy Closure In Patients With Rectal Cancer
DOC.criteria: Age : 2075 rectal cancer s/p neoadjuvant concurrent chemoradiotherapy follow double staple low anterior resection Metastatic cancer Pregnancy Valvular heart disease s/p intersphincteric resection ( index surgery ) h/o anastomotic leakage ( index surgery ) medically unfit ( cardiopulmonary dysfunction , sepsis etc )
